A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke warm film. Too many bad bad moments to be regarded as a good film. That's not too say there was not good moments. It's watchable but somehow feels superficial. Most of the story arcs reach an unfulfilling end. The conclusion to all the plots are usually totally unplausable or poposterous. A CGI mess or a completely lucky escape. Their is usually not talent or intelligence behind the way situations resolve. It all takes a leap of imagination. Alot of cheese moments. Untimely hollow  deaths.Best part is the humour. Very good. Genuinely funny.
